page.title: 07NICOLA'S SATURDAY
page.content: Most weekends I go to Stockton with my family. Sometimes we stay just a short while and others a few hours. We have lunch in a cafe called Carricks and it costs us about Â£2. Then we all split up and meet at a certain time.After shopping we go home and have a cup of tea and something to eat. After tea we go to my aunt's house and watch a video. I go back to my nana's and give my mam a kiss because she goes out with my dad and friends to the pub on Saturday night. Then I go to the fish and chip shop with my auntie. We walk down together and I am left at my nana's for the night. Before I go to bed I watch television for a little while.
